data.title: Best Movies Like The Alphabet Killer
meta_keywords: movies similar to The Alphabet Killer
data.meta_description: Movies Similar to The Alphabet Killer: The Zodiac (2005), Pendulum (2001), The Factory (2012), The Watcher (2000), Manhunter (1986), Suspect Zero (2004), Untraceable (2008), Far from Home (1989), Curdled (1996), Marshland (2014)
